document_data.name: Pinta
document_data.mainbody: '''Pinta''' was a member of the [[Shadow Druids]] of the [[Cloakwood Forest]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: She wore a simple [[leather]] harness and trousers.
document_data.Activities: While acting in secret within the [[Emerald Grove]], Pinta took on the animal form of a large [[rat]].
document_data.Possessions: She preferred to utilize a [[shortbow]] in combat.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Pinta joined [[Wren]] and their superior [[Olodan]] on a mission to infiltrate the Emerald Grove south along the [[Sword Coast]]. Together they worked with [[Kagha]], a trusted leader within the [[Emerald Enclave]] who ascended as [[archdruid]] in the absence of Master [[Halsin]]. They aimed to protect the grove from a growing horde of [[goblin]]s and other monstrous creatures, that threatened druid enclaves across the region.
